about_the_game:
Bakö is a dark 2D adventure game that will tell you a story about family, life and death.



No matter how old we are, we always need a place called home and people to call a family. After all, without the ones you love, you will still fell lonely.
Bakö is not an action movie about superheroes or well-worn team shooter.

It is a touching story about the 12 years old boy that got into trouble and finds himself on the other side of reality. Observing his relatives, he sees a great pain tormenting their souls and minds.



He decides to help them. But in the end it is not obvious who needs help more, Bakö or his Family

FEATURES


  • Unique, Psychological story About Family
  • Dark and Horror Atmosphere
  • Unique hand Drawn 2d Arts and Animations
  • Look on how people overcome the pain by reading the Psychologist observation diaries
  • Tons of stylised riddles and puzzles
  • Original soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Dark, scary but touching story about family, life and death. Go to the other side of reality and find the demons that tormenting your family. But be ready to know the reason why they appeared...
